org.fosstrak.epcis.queryclient
Class QueryClientGuiHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.epcis.queryclient.QueryClientGuiHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, AuthenticationOptionsChangeListener
public class QueryClientGuiHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationOptionsChangeListener

Implements a class to interface with the EPCIS query client. Also offers some helper methods to convert between different formats and for debug output.

Author:
David Gubler

QueryClientGuiHelper

public QueryClientGuiHelper(QueryClientGui mainWindow)
Constructor. Takes the service endpoint address and a JTextArea used for debug output as arguments.

Parameters:
queryUrl - The URL of the query web service.
area - The text area where debug output will be written to.

configurationChanged

public void configurationChanged(AuthenticationOptionsChangeEvent ace)
Set whether or not the configuration has changed. The components in the configuration panel call this method when their state is updated.

Specified by:
configurationChanged in interface AuthenticationOptionsChangeListener
Parameters:
configurationComplete - Indicates whether or not the information present is enough to enable the client to connect to a repository (e.g. both a username and password are available if Basic authentication is chosen).
